About Us

Cricket Tournament Manager is your all-in-one platform for organizing and managing cricket tournaments. From team registrations to match schedules and live score updates — we make cricket management effortless.

{/* Features Section */}

Features

  • 🏆 Tournament Creation
  • 👥 Team & Player Registration
